name: dwiextract
description:
Extract diffusion-weighted volumes, b=0 volumes, or certain shells from a DWI dataset.



References:
author: David Raffelt (david.raffelt@florey.edu.au) and Thijs Dhollander (thijs.dhollander@gmail.com) and Robert E. Smith (robert.smith@florey.edu.au)

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: the input DW image.

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: the output image (diffusion-weighted volumes by default).

inputs.name: bzero
inputs.description: Output b=0 volumes (instead of the diffusion weighted volumes, if -singleshell is not specified).

inputs.name: no_bzero
inputs.description: Output only non b=0 volumes (default, if -singleshell is not specified).

inputs.name: singleshell
inputs.description: Force a single-shell (single non b=0 shell) output. This will include b=0 volumes, if present. Use with -bzero to enforce presence of b=0 volumes (error if not present) or with -no_bzero to exclude them.

inputs.name: grad
inputs.description: Provide the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in a text file. This should be supplied as a 4xN text file with each line is in the format [ X Y Z b ], where [ X Y Z ] describe the direction of the applied gradient, and b gives the b-value in units of s/mm^2. If a diffusion gradient scheme is present in the input image header, the data provided with this option will be instead used.

inputs.name: fslgrad
inputs.description: Provide the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs/bvals format files. If a diffusion gradient scheme is present in the input image header, the data provided with this option will be instead used.

type.name: fslgrad
type.description: Provide the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs/bvals format files. If a diffusion gradient scheme is present in the input image header, the data provided with this option will be instead used.

inputs.name: bvecs
inputs.description: Provide the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs/bvals format files. If a diffusion gradient scheme is present in the input image header, the data provided with this option will be instead used.

inputs.name: bvals
inputs.description: Provide the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs/bvals format files. If a diffusion gradient scheme is present in the input image header, the data provided with this option will be instead used.

inputs.name: shells
inputs.description:
specify one or more b-values to use during processing, as a comma-separated list of the desired approximate b-values (b-values are clustered to allow for small deviations). Note that some commands are incompatible with multiple b-values, and will report an error if more than one b-value is provided. 
WARNING: note that, even though the b=0 volumes are never referred to as shells in the literature, they still have to be explicitly included in the list of b-values as provided to the -shell option! Several algorithms which include the b=0 volumes in their computations may otherwise return an undesired result.

inputs.name: export_grad_mrtrix
inputs.description: export the diffusion-weighted gradient table to file in MRtrix format

inputs.name: export_grad_fsl
inputs.description: export the diffusion-weighted gradient table to files in FSL (bvecs / bvals) format

type.name: export_grad_fsl
type.description: export the diffusion-weighted gradient table to files in FSL (bvecs / bvals) format

inputs.name: bvecs_path
inputs.description: export the diffusion-weighted gradient table to files in FSL (bvecs / bvals) format

inputs.name: bvals_path
inputs.description: export the diffusion-weighted gradient table to files in FSL (bvecs / bvals) format

output-files.name: bvecs_path
output-files.description: export the diffusion-weighted gradient table to files in FSL (bvecs / bvals) format

output-files.name: bvals_path
output-files.description: export the diffusion-weighted gradient table to files in FSL (bvecs / bvals) format

inputs.name: import_pe_table
inputs.description: import a phase-encoding table from file

inputs.name: import_pe_eddy
inputs.description: import phase-encoding information from an EDDY-style config / index file pair

type.name: import_pe_eddy
type.description: import phase-encoding information from an EDDY-style config / index file pair

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: import phase-encoding information from an EDDY-style config / index file pair

inputs.name: indices
inputs.description: import phase-encoding information from an EDDY-style config / index file pair

inputs.name: pe
inputs.description: select volumes with a particular phase encoding; this can be three comma-separated values (for i,j,k components of vector direction) or four (direction & total readout time)

inputs.name: strides
inputs.description: specify the strides of the output data in memory; either as a comma-separated list of (signed) integers, or as a template image from which the strides shall be extracted and used. The actual strides produced will depend on whether the output image format can support it.

inputs.name: info
inputs.description: display information messages.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: display debugging messages.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: display version information and exit.

output-files.name: output
output-files.description: the output image (diffusion-weighted volumes by default).

output-files.name: export_grad_mrtrix
output-files.description: export the diffusion-weighted gradient table to file in MRtrix format
